answers.answer: Hi!In all probability you have a stye or eye boil or hordeolum as it is medically called. If your getting stye is persisting, it could be due to touching eyes with dirty hands, infection of the tear gland, diabetes, immunoglobulin M (IgM) deficiency, dry eyes,or refractive errors of the eye like near sightedness or farsightedness. You should consult an eye specialist for this. Warm compress, topical antibiotics and good person hygiene usually does the trick. However, please consult your eye specialist or take a second opinion.Take care!
